name: You Alone
description:
Prototyping out an idea for a third person survival shooter, so i thought this game jam would be a good place to start working on it, lots not finished but will continue working on it so look out for updates if you want. basic crafting system in place, starting to work on the building system. Much of the map is not finished but hopefully it will give you an idea of where it is heading.

Hope you enjoy the start of this journey .
